General.Name: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic, magnesium, and mold products in Thailand and internationally. The company offers plastic parts for use in automotive parts and home appliances. It also provides magnesium parts that are used in automobiles, computers, mobile phones, cameras, etc. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Muang, Thailand. Thai Mitsuwa Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Mitsuwa Electric Industry Co., Ltd.
